name: E-commerce Website
description: An e-commerce website for online shopping.
body_html:
My Project

Welcome to My Project! This project does the following:

This project is an e-commerce website that allows users to browse and purchase products online. It includes features such as product listings, shopping cart, and checkout process.Technologies used include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and a backend server for handling transactions.

name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills.
body_html:
My Project

Welcome to My Project! This project does the following:

This project is a personal portfolio website designed to showcase my projects, skills, and experience. It features a clean and modern design with responsive layout for different devices.Technologies used include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

name: Blog Platform
description: A blogging platform for creating and sharing blog posts.
body_html:
My Project

Welcome to My Project! This project does the following:

This project is a blogging platform that allows users to create, edit, and share blog posts. It features a user-friendly interface and supports rich text formatting.Technologies used include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and a backend server for managing posts and user accounts.
